title: Age of Mythology: Retold Minor Update 18.34798
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!

title: Age of Empires IV – Season Eleven Update Preview 14.0.4963
description: Hello Age of Empires IV community and welcome to a shiny, new Season Eleven update preview! Coming next week, we’ve got lots of exciting things in store with a new game mode, updates to enemy AI, a bevy of balance changes and bugfixes, plus a Trade Secrets Event! You can read all the details in the update … Continued

title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.33318
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!

title: Age of Empires devient le premier partenariat de jeu vidéo du Louvre
description: Aujourd’hui, nous sommes ravis d’annoncer qu’Age of Empires est en partenariat avec le musée le plus visité au monde, le Louvre à Paris! Le 30 avril, le Louvre a lancé une exposition sur le sultanat mamlouk (1250-1517), une première en Europe. L’exposition vise à partager l’histoire de cet âge d’or du Proche-Orient islamique, en mettant … Continued

title: Age of Empires Becomes the Louvre’s First Gaming Partnership
description: Today we are thrilled to announce that Age of Empires is partnering with the world’s most-visited museum, the Louvre in Paris! On April 30th, the Louvre launched an exhibition on the Mamluk sultanate (1250-1517), a European first. The exhibition aims to share the story of this golden age of the Islamic Near East, showcasing its … Continued
